questions.quote: Oh, I just want to you know I'm retracting our dinner invitation.
Oh, yeah, yeah, I'm fine, I'm fine.  Hey, we made the paper. Eh? Look at this- page 2, sports section... we're all in the picture.
Flash of lightning Elaine I just realized why I like this cartoon so much.
well, I'm sure we'll come up with something. What do you say you and I order ourselves a pie? Do you like Lorenzo's?
Thousand.  Six hundred and twenty thousand.  The horror, the horror.   The wife keeps giving us dirty looks.  Are you sure you gave him the right directions?
Why don't you just tell me the name of the movie you've selected.
And I was looking good, too. I had a nice, new shirt on, I'm wearing *your* jacket...
They like it outside, so I kept them in a cage on the terrace...then I found them dead in a pool of water!
I 've looked everywhere , even under the couch but all I could find were the stupid Chunky wrappers. I couldn't....
Their grieving time is a luxury I can't afford. I'm calling Beth tonight, and if you want a clean shot at David, I suggest you do likewise.
